rhine.name: Advance to the Rhine
rhine.image_query: War Thunder Advance to the Rhine map tactical view

north.title: NORTH SPAWN (The Park)
north.strategy: The North Spawn offers direct access to the long fire lane on the East (Column 9). DO NOT rush the central monument directly; you will be cross-fired from the South debris.

routes.name: The A-Line Hook (West)
routes.desc: Fast tanks only. Rush A1-A2 immediately. Hug the map border. This flanks the enemy heavy tanks pushing the center.

routes.name: The Sniper Alley (East)
routes.desc: TDs and Heavy Tanks. Move to the destroyed tramway in Column 8. Lock down the long road. Do not cross the open park without smoke.

north.traps: The central park circle is a kill zone. Artillery and CAS spam land here. Avoid unless capping late game.

south.title: SOUTH SPAWN (The Station)
south.strategy: South has the advantage for C-point control. Rush the rubble piles at C4 immediately. These offer hull-down positions for MBTs.

routes.name: The C-Rush
routes.desc: Heavies/MBTs. Drive straight to C. Use the dead T-34 prop tank as cover. Angle your armor.

routes.name: The B-Line Ambush
routes.desc: Light Tanks. Drive into the bombed-out building at B4. You can shoot enemies in the side as they cross the main road.

roles.desc: Do not brawl. Your goal is A-Line flank or B4 ambush. Scout enemies crossing the park. Artillery the C point constantly.
You are the Anchor. Hold the C point rubble or the North Tramway. Sidescrape off the buildings. Do not push into the open park.
Stay in spawn protection or behind the tall buildings in Column 1. Helicopters usually pop up from the East River side.
Approach from the North-South axis (parallel to streets) to spot targets in alleys. Bomb the C point rubble piles; there is always a camper there.

timings.desc: Rush Phase. Lights take A-flank. Heavies reach the first rubble pile.
The Brawl. C point is contested. Smoke shells are critical here to cross streets.
The team that controls the A-flank usually wins by spawn camping the side.

poland.name: Poland (Fields of)
poland.image_query: War Thunder Poland map strategy guide

north.title: NORTH-EAST SPAWN (Windmill)
north.strategy: You have the high ground advantage near the Windmill (C Point). Snipers should set up on the ridge lines overlooking the lake.

routes.name: The Windmill Ridge
routes.desc: Snipers/MBTs. Go to grid E7. You can see the entire town and the South spawn exit.

routes.name: The City Rush
routes.desc: Brawlers. Rush into the town church. It's CQC. Watch for crossfire from the lake.

south.title: SOUTH-WEST SPAWN (Forest)
south.strategy: You must cross open ground to reach the city. Smoke is essential. Alternatively, perform a wide flank through the far west forest.

routes.name: The Forest Flank (West)
routes.desc: Light Tanks. Go wide A-Line. Flank behind the snipers on the Northern ridge.

routes.name: The Castle Hull-Down
routes.desc: MBTs. Use the ridge near the castle ruins to snipe across the lake.

roles.desc: This is your map. Set up on the ridges outside town. Rangefinding is key. 1200m+ shots are common.
Fight in the city or support the sniper line. If in city, clear the streets one by one.
Pop up over the lake. Use the trees on the shoreline to mask your approach. ATGMs are deadly here.

timings.desc: Race to the ridges. First one hull-down wins the sniper duel.
The team that wins the city usually pushes out to spawn camp the open fields.

sinai.name: Sands of Sinai
sinai.image_query: War Thunder Sands of Sinai map tactics

north.title: NORTH SPAWN (Rocks)
north.strategy: The huge rock formation at A is the key. Control it, and you control the map. Do not drive in the open dunes.

routes.name: The A-Rock Fortress
routes.desc: Heavies/MBTs. Brawl inside the rock arches at A. It's safe from snipers.

routes.name: The East Ridge Sniper
routes.desc: Light Tanks/TDs. Climb the rocks on the far East. Spot the entire map.

south.title: SOUTH SPAWN (Village)
south.strategy: Use the dunes to hull-down. The village at C offers cover, but leaving it is dangerous.

routes.name: The Dune Sea
routes.desc: MBTs. Use gun depression to peek over dunes. Shoot and scoop.

routes.name: The C-Point Brawl
routes.desc: Brawlers. Fight in the village. Watch for snipers on the East Ridge.

roles.desc: Scouting is OP here. Sit on a ridge, scout targets for your team. Use thermal binoculars.
Open desert means tanks have nowhere to hide. Easy pickings. Watch for SAMs which also have clear sightlines.

timings.desc: Snipers duel from spawn to spawn (2km shots).
Light tanks flanking wide East usually decide the match.
